hopobject.name: CamCon
hopobject.body: Photo CamCon is for photographers who wants to try new possibilities of use of their cameras. The primary aim of this project is to develop and realize device for advanced control of DSLR cameras. CamCon is able to remote control digital camera, set parametres of photography (e.g. exposure, shutter, aperture …) and transfer pictures from the camera to another location/devices.
hopobject.shortdesc: The primary aim of this project is to develop and realize device for advanced control of DSLR cameras.
